Acid Whirlpool.name: Acid Whirlpool
Acid Whirlpool.fullText:
Soul of Erosion Attack 11Acid Whirlpool

Tainted water flies out from you to strike a foe before you draw it, and your foe, back in to you.

Encounter        Acid
Standard Action      Close burst 3

Target: Each creature in the burst

Attack: Strength or Intelligence + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength or Intelligence + 9 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2d8 + Strength or Intelligence modifier acid damage, and you pull the target 2 squares.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 23.
Acid Whirlpool.flavor: Tainted water flies out from you to strike a foe before you draw it, and your foe, back in to you.
Acid Whirlpool.attack:
Strength or Intelligence + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength or Intelligence + 9 vs. Fortitude
Acid Whirlpool.onHit: 2d8 + Strength or Intelligence modifier acid damage, and you pull the target 2 squares.

Corrosive Torrent.name: Corrosive Torrent
Corrosive Torrent.fullText:
Soul of Erosion Attack 20Corrosive Torrent

You create a rushing flow of fluid that makes the eyes water and burns the flesh.

Daily        Acid
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each creature in the blast

Attack: Strength or Intelligence + 9 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d6 + Strength modifier or Intelligence modifier acid damage. You push the target 2 squares, and the target takes ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).


Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 23.
Corrosive Torrent.flavor: You create a rushing flow of fluid that makes the eyes water and burns the flesh.
Corrosive Torrent.onHit: 2d6 + Strength modifier or Intelligence modifier acid damage. You push the target 2 squares, and the target takes ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).
Corrosive Torrent.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).

Causticsoul Skin.name: Causticsoul Skin
Causticsoul Skin.fullText:
Soul of Erosion Utility 12Causticsoul Skin

Your body dissolves into water and acid and clings to your enemy.

Daily        Acid
Move Action      Melee 1

Target: One creature

Effect: You shift 1 square into the target’s space and occupy the same space as the target. While you occupy the target’s space, the target takes ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends), you cannot attack the target, and if the target moves, you move with it. You take half damage from melee and ranged attacks, and the target takes the same amount and type of damage (the target ignores this part of the effect). This effect ends when the target succeeds on its saving throw or if you move or are forced to move out of the target’s space. If the effect ends while you are in the target’s space, you shift to an unoccupied space adjacent to the target.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 23.
Causticsoul Skin.flavor: Your body dissolves into water and acid and clings to your enemy.
Causticsoul Skin.effect: You shift 1 square into the target’s space and occupy the same space as the target. While you occupy the target’s space, the target takes ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends), you cannot attack the target, and if the target moves, you move with it. You take half damage from melee and ranged attacks, and the target takes the same amount and type of damage (the target ignores this part of the effect). This effect ends when the target succeeds on its saving throw or if you move or are forced to move out of the target’s space. If the effect ends while you are in the target’s space, you shift to an unoccupied space adjacent to the target.
